short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simply To-Do List Tab allows you to change new tab with simple background images and help you to maintain the to-do list.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simply To-Do List Tab allows you to change new tab with simple background images and help you to maintain the to-do list.

Make lists, outlines, to-dos, and more. With Simply To-Do List Tab extension for Chrome, just open a New Tab to capture your ideas, goals, and daily tasks. 

Simple, clean, and beautifully designed with relaxing backgrounds. 

By clicking ‘Add to Chrome’, you accept and agree to installing the Simply To-Do List Tab extension.
